metadata.title: CVE-2023-25511 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability incuobjdump, where a division-by-zero error may enable a user to cause acrash, which may lead to a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
